lines.text:
[He's just been shot]
Do you have any good drugs?

[as Carter sacrifices himself so the others can get clear in time]
Good luck on the other-side
Watch your first step... it's a big one
[salutes Wilson as he closes the hatch as their space station begins re-entry]

[poisoning Treadwell with the same toxin he used on his aide]
You might call this dramatic irony

[on the last assassin busting the shuttle whilst escaping]
He just sheared off the heat shield, he'll burn up on re-entry
He's got a one way trip to hell he just doesn't know it yet
Oh... thanks for leaving it in my hands
[drives his car straight off a bridge, which crashes and burns far below]
